data.oai_dc:dc: Information of traits of the 112 animals, for which we could obtain mean seed retention time. They include 51 birds, 47 mammals, 7 reptiles, 5 fishes and 2 invertebrates. Body mass, food habit, and degestive strategy of each animal are shown. Food habits are indicated as categories, C, carnivore (including insectivore), F, frugivore, H, hervirore, O, ominivore.
